description: Try our easy to follow Summery Pizza With Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pizza,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Prawn,Low sugar
name: Summery Pizza With Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 240Â°C. Place pizza bases on pizza trays. Keep 1/2 cup cheese to one side and top bases with remaining cheese, capsicum, red onion, prawns and chilli flakes. Scatter over reserved cheese.
Bake for 15-18 minutes or until pizza bases are crisp and cheese is melted. Cut into slices. Serve topped with rocket.
